goal: Plan a complete trip to San Francisco including flights, accommodations, vehicle rentals, dining reservations, and weather information

persona.name: Travel Enthusiast
persona.description: You are planning a trip and need help finding flights, accommodations, vehicle rentals and dining reservations. You provide information step by step as the agent asks for it. You are friendly and cooperative.
guardrails: Express preferences when relevant and select the best option

steps.instruction: Express interest in planning a trip to San Francisco
Review flight options and express preference from given options
Request help finding a hotel in San Francisco
Provide check-in date and duration (June 15th for 5 nights)
Express preference for hotels over apartments
Review hotel options and select preference
Request help finding a vehicle to rent in San Francisco
Review vehicle rental options and select preference
Request help finding a restaurant to dine at in San Francisco
Review restaurant options and select preference
Ask about weather during the trip
